lead_paragraph: ROBBINS--Albert L.,on June 24, 2016. Beloved husband of Adele. Loving father of Marc and the late Nina and father-in-law of Mary. Cherished grandfather of Sarah and Michael. Dear brother-in-law of Lorraine. Adoring uncle. Loved by numerous friends. Member of Temple Beth Sholom. Services Monday, June 27, 10am, Sinai Chapels, 162-05 Horace Harding Expwy, Fresh Meadows, NY. Contributions may be made to Temple Beth Sholom, Flushing, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROBBINS, ALBERT L.
